meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Eric Balaban Maria Lasalvia-Seliga Phyllis McDonald Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #527.

td.p: Eric Balaban, a student from Silver Spring, Maryland
Maria Lasalvia-Seliga, a teacher from Metuchen, New Jersey
Phyllis McDonald, a homemaker from Kentfield, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $2,799)

tr.td: BIOLOGY
BUSINESS & INDUSTRY
CELEBRITY SECRETS
DRAGONS
FOREIGN DINING
(Alex: And for the first time this season...)
ALPHABETICALLY FIRST

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_2_2', 'clue_J_2_2_stuck', '(Maria: What is tomato sauce?)
(Alex: Mmmmmm...be a little more specific.)
(Maria: [Tries to think of a response.])
---
(Alex: Ragu [*], yes. Couldn\'t accept just "tomato" there.))

spaghetti sauce

MariaEric
')

---
(Alex: The correct response is, What is [*]. The specific gas was [*]. And we\'ve got less than a minute to go, Maria.)

gas (hydrogen)

Maria
Triple Stumper
')

')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Phyllis
Maria
Eric
(lock game)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [After revealing Maria\'s response.] Because February can have 28 days, [*] can start on the same day as February.)
---
(Eric: [On reveal.] I have March written over here. I have M-A-R and a dot.)
[Judges voices are heard offstage.]
(Alex: Oh, boy this is a judgment call, isn\'t it guys? He crossed out January and he says that\'s March.)
(Eric: M-A-R dot.)
(Alex: Okay. We\'ve got 3 people nodding in agreement over there, & I\'d give it to you also.
MariaWhat is March?
$1,790
EricWhat is January M[illegible]
$2,200
PhyllisWhat is February? January?
$1,800
March')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'It\'s only month that can start on the same day of the week as the month before it')

tr.td: THE MONTHS
(Alex: There are, at last count, 12 of them.)
It's only month that can start on the same day of the week as the month before it
Phyllis
Maria
Eric
2-day champion: $7,299
3rd place: Speed Queen washer & dryer
2nd place: trip to New Orleans
Phyllis
Maria
Eric

16 R
(including 2 DDs),
0 W

12 R,
4 W
(including 1 DD)

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
